title: kUsu kaNDevamma
sahitya:
kUsu kaNDevamma amma nimma kUsu kaNDevamma


caraNam 1    kAsige vIsava baDDi gaLisi koNDu shESa giriya mEle vAsavAgiddane
    caraNam 2    vancisi baleyoL-prapancavella seLedu kanci paTTanadi bal-mincAgiddane
    caraNam 3    kuDDa berLoLetti doDDi gOvgaLa kAida oDDi jagannATha giDDAgiddane
    caraNam 4    duDuku mADi hAlu maDagegaLa oDedu haDaganEri bandu uDupili iddena
    caraNam 5    mangaLa rEge pAdangaLuLLa nimma ranga purandara viTTala shrI krSNana
